name: Berlin Scooter
description:
Ping and his little dog Mika are visiting the city of Berlin for the first time. Suddenly Kong the crazy ape who escaped from a nearby filmset is kidnapping Mika. Kong also tries to rob the Nofretete, one of the most famous samples of the city museum. Ping the Penguin jumps on his superfast scooter and a wild chase throughout the city begins. The game  introduces the famous anime characters of the Berlin based comic artist Mic Lololand.

GENRE

2D platformer game with puzzle and race elements.

FEATURES

  • Cute character animations. The cheeky dog. The crazy ape. Ping the little penguin.
  • 15 individual game levels. All with their own little story.
  • Many different vehicles to ride. The scooter, the balloon, the digger, the cleaning car, the rubber boat, the metro.
  • You move around Berlin and his monuments. You will construct the new airport, you will save the Berlin wall, you will visit the Egyptian museum. You will make street music at Alexanderplatz.
